reasoning: Secondary Parkinson disease has lower incidence than primary PD (~2.5 per 100k annually). Incidence-based metric used for this incident condition with defined onset. Confidence moderate due to limited population-based registry data compared to primary PD.
source: Movement Disorder Society epidemiological surveys, cited in Oertel WH et al. (2007). Parkinsonism Relat Disord. 13(S2):S5-S27
